archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: U.S. Circuit Court Criminal Docket - Bickley Mills, VA, 1893-1907
did.abstract: Collection consists of the criminal docket of the U.S. Circuit Court located in Bickley Mills, Virginia (Russell County). Entries date from 1893 through 1897. Also present are documents related to correspondence and receipts to William Jessee, the constable of Russell County. These documents date from 1906 through 1907.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from U.S. Circuit Court Criminal Docket - Bickley Mills, VA, must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: U.S. Circuit Court Criminal Docket - Bickley Mills, VA, Ms2011-085, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the U.S. Circuit Court Criminal Docket - Bickley Mills, VA was completed in September 2011.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of the criminal docket of the U.S. Circuit Court located in Bickley Mills, Virginia (Russell County). Entries date from 1893 through 1897. Also present are documents related to correspondence and receipts to William Jessee, the constable of Russell County. These documents date from 1906 through 1907 and mainly consist of payment receipts for fines.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by material type.
